class.name: AbstractParameterizable

javadoc.text: This abstract class provides boilerplate parameters list.

javadoc.param: names names of the supported parameters
names names of the supported parameters

javadoc.text: Check if a parameter is supported and throw an IllegalArgumentException if not.
javadoc.param: name name of the parameter to check
javadoc.exception: UnknownParameterException if the parameter is not supported
